title: skripka
author: skripka
created_time: December 22, 2022, 11:10:03 AMLast edit: December 29, 2022, 01:03:19 PM by skripka
content: Our service helps to make any exchange safely and quickly.Exchange directions:Cryptocurrencies: BTC, USDT (trc20/erc20) ,ETH, BNB, LTC, DOGE, DASH, ZEC, TRX, USDC (trc20/erc20)Banks: transfers to bank cards in Turkey (lira), Russia (rub) and Ukraine (UAH).Cash: applications are processed manually and delivered to any city in Turkey, Russia and Ukraine.You can ask about all the details of our services in Telegram or ask your questions in the chat on the site.Our advantages:User protection after transactions. We do not store or transfer your data to third parties, because we encrypt all wallet addresses and bank card numbers after the application is made.Complete anonymity. We do not ask the user to provide us with his mail, phone number or payer's full name.The service has a system of discounts, which depends on the total amount of the exchange made once. The larger the exchange amount, the greater the discountSupport works in 3 languages.Our contacts:Telegram: @Borsa_exchange_botE-mail: hello@borsa.cashSite: https://borsa.cash/

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: skripka on December 22, 2022, 11:10:03 AMWelcome to Borsa.cash, a rapid cryptocurrency exchange service!There is no FAQ or about page and I can't find any information on your website if you are asking for kyc verification in some cases or not.It's also strange that I can't exchange money when I want but I have to wait your working hours to do this, that probably means that everything is done manually.All this doesn't look very reliable to me :/

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Are you affiliated to crypocto.comIf not, then why are we seeing a similar announcement just like theirs?Let me quote their ANN. Quote from: Crypocto on April 20, 2022, 09:51:04 AMGood afternoon, forum participants!We would like to introduce you to Crypocto rapid cryptocurrency exchange service. Here you will find a wide range of fiat and crypto destinations: BTC, USDT, ETH, LTC, UAH, RUB, XRP, SHIBA, DOGE, XMR. We are waiting for each of you!We made the service: simple, convenient and easy to conduct transactions. We fix the rate at the moment of transaction (except for the delay of the deposit by the client for more than 30 minutes).We are sure you will appreciate the advantages. And if you have any questions - we are always in touch!Our schedule:Mon. - Fri. from 10:00 to 22:00Saturday - Sunday free schedule.We are open for new suggestions!We are constantly developing and adding new destinations. We have a bonus and referral program. Become an affiliate and get rewarded for your invited users!Why is Crypocto the best?Rapid because you don't need to register to exchange.Convenient because the exchange from 10 usd, for 5-30 minutes.Profitable because always updated rate.Safe and secure because SSL-protocol is used to communicate with the site.Customer support because through different communication channels: chat-bot on the site, Telegram or e-mail. You can choose any convenient way!Contacts:E-Mail: support@crypocto.comTelegram: https://t.me/crypoctoLooks familiar isn't it?

comments.author: skripka
comments.body: Quote from: dkbit98 on December 22, 2022, 09:17:50 PMQuote from: skripka on December 22, 2022, 11:10:03 AMWelcome to Borsa.cash, a rapid cryptocurrency exchange service!There is no FAQ or about page and I can't find any information on your website if you are asking for kyc verification in some cases or not.It's also strange that I can't exchange money when I want but I have to wait your working hours to do this, that probably means that everything is done manually.All this doesn't look very reliable to me :/Good afternoon1) We do not request KYC verification.2) At the moment there is indeed a semi-automatic verification of applications.

comments.author: skripka
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on December 22, 2022, 09:20:43 PMAre you affiliated to crypocto.comIf not, then why are we seeing a similar announcement just like theirs?Let me quote their ANN. Looks familiar isn't it?We are grateful that you brought this to your attention.It's really very similar and I think it needs to be fixed. But we have nothing to do with crypocto.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: @skripkaI had a quick glance at your website and it looks like there's a flaw in the system [it doesn't warn or rather stop users from making exchanges that require having more funds than your current reserve]!- BTW, your domain is about to expire...Code:Registry Expiry Date: 2023-02-13

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: skripka on December 29, 2022, 12:52:26 PMWe are grateful that you brought this to your attention.It's really very similar and I think it needs to be fixed. But we have nothing to do with crypocto.So, If I may ask, give us a couple of reasons why members should trust your service after what has been uncovered?I always think a genuine service should start off by being original and creating their own content from scratch, not just copy and pasting from competitors. What I have seen in the past is that it's usually scammers that keep plagiarizing content from other services and post it as their own to lure unsuspecting victims. Why should we think that your intentions are different?

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Quote from: skripka on December 22, 2022, 11:10:03 AMOur service helps to make any exchange safely and quickly.Exchange directions:Cryptocurrencies: BTC, USDT (trc20/erc20) ,ETH, BNB, LTC, DOGE, DASH, ZEC, TRX, USDC (trc20/erc20)Banks: transfers to bank cards in Turkey (lira), Russia (rub) and Ukraine (UAH).Cash: applications are processed manually and delivered to any city in Turkey, Russia and Ukraine.You can ask about all the details of our services in Telegram or ask your questions in the chat on the site.Our advantages:User protection after transactions. We do not store or transfer your data to third parties, because we encrypt all wallet addresses and bank card numbers after the application is made.Complete anonymity. We do not ask the user to provide us with his mail, phone number or payer's full name.The service has a system of discounts, which depends on the total amount of the exchange made once. The larger the exchange amount, the greater the discountSupport works in 3 languages.Our contacts:Telegram: @Borsa_exchange_botE-mail: hello@borsa.cashSite: https://borsa.cash/ Welcome onboard. It is good you registered your presence here. I was able to go through your website but I find it kind of irritating. The user interface is very poor to write about, no much insight about your activities on your website. I suggest you work on your website and I would want to know about your means of operations. Are you limited to just the three countries mentioned on your website or they are just there as example of places you deliver transfer to? And lastly, it would be nice you answer thisQuote from: JeromeTash on January 06, 2023, 06:42:47 AMQuote from: skripka on December 29, 2022, 12:52:26 PMWe are grateful that you brought this to your attention.It's really very similar and I think it needs to be fixed. But we have nothing to do with crypocto.So, If I may ask, give us a couple of reasons why members should trust your service after what has been uncovered?I always think a genuine service should start off by being original and creating their own content from scratch, not just copy and pasting from competitors. What I have seen in the past is that it's usually scammers that keep plagiarizing content from other services and post it as their own to lure unsuspecting victims. Why should we think that your intentions are different?This will further give clarity on your reputation here.

comments.author: skripka
comments.body: Thank you for the quick test. We will fix this in the next update.Quote from: SFR10 on January 04, 2023, 01:08:41 PM@skripkaI had a quick glance at your website and it looks like there's a flaw in the system [it doesn't warn or rather stop users from making exchanges that require having more funds than your current reserve]!- BTW, your domain is about to expire...Code:Registry Expiry Date: 2023-02-13

comments.author: skripka
comments.body: You have every right to doubt our service, because we posted on this forum quite recently and do not have a sufficient feedback base to dispel all doubts. But all companies go through this, and our team is interested in long-term relationships with our new and old clients. You can always make a small deal and check the integrity of our activities.Quote from: JeromeTash on January 06, 2023, 06:42:47 AMQuote from: skripka on December 29, 2022, 12:52:26 PMWe are grateful that you brought this to your attention.It's really very similar and I think it needs to be fixed. But we have nothing to do with crypocto.So, If I may ask, give us a couple of reasons why members should trust your service after what has been uncovered?I always think a genuine service should start off by being original and creating their own content from scratch, not just copy and pasting from competitors. What I have seen in the past is that it's usually scammers that keep plagiarizing content from other services and post it as their own to lure unsuspecting victims. Why should we think that your intentions are different?
